pokedexEntries.ruby: In battle, Blaziken blows out intense flames from its wrists and attacks the foe courageously. The stronger the foes, the more intensely this Pokémon's wrists burn.
pokedexEntries.sapphire: Blaziken has incredibly strong legs - it can easily clear a 30-story building in one leap. This Pokémon's blazing punches leave its foes scorched and blackened.
pokedexEntries.emerald: It learns martial arts that use punches and kicks. Every several years, its old feathers burn off, and new, supple feathers grow back in their place.
pokedexEntries.fireRed: When facing a tough foe, it looses flames from its wrists. Its powerful legs let it jump clear over buildings.
pokedexEntries.leafGreen: When facing a tough foe, it looses flames from its wrists. Its powerful legs let it jump clear over buildings.
pokedexEntries.diamond: Flames spout from its wrists, enveloping its knuckles. Its punches scorch its foes.
pokedexEntries.pearl: Flames spout from its wrists, enveloping its knuckles. Its punches scorch its foes.
pokedexEntries.platinum: Flames spout from its wrists, enveloping its knuckles. Its punches scorch its foes.
pokedexEntries.heartGold: It can clear a 30-story building in a leap. Its fiery punches scorch its foes.

pokedexEntries.omegaRuby: In battle, Blaziken blows out intense flames from its wrists and attacks foes courageously. The stronger the foe, the more intensely this Pokémon’s wrists burn.
pokedexEntries.alphaSapphire: Blaziken has incredibly strong legs—it can easily clear a 30-story building in one leap. This Pokémon’s blazing punches leave its foes scorched and blackened.
